hercpanorama

The goal of hercpanorama is to provide a common set of tools for wrangling and analyzing the CSV outputs from Panorama reports.

Installation

You can install the development version of hercpanorama from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("higherX4Racine/hercpanorama")
